mobile.name: juve
mobile.long_descr: A juve is standing here plotting mischief.
mobile.description:
He is a tall, thin boy.  He is looking for his gang mates.  He and his

                   |mates have cost city authorities many millions of creds a week in

                   |vandalism repairs.

mobile.name: punk
mobile.long_descr: A punk is here plotting a crime wave.
mobile.description:
This punk is from one of the rowdiest, scruffiest, and definitely most

                   |fashionable of all gangs -- the Grunge Mongers.

mobile.name: Futsie
mobile.long_descr: A Futsie is here reciting Monty Python sketches.
mobile.description:
A sad victim of Future Shock, this man is immensely dangerous and will

                   |not be stopped by anyone who tries to deter him from revenge upon the

                   |Justice Department.

mobile.name: Citi-Def Militiaman
mobile.long_descr: A Citi-Def Militiaman is here contemplating a Block War.
mobile.description:
A member of a local Block's Citi-Def militia, this man is well-armed

                   |and undersupervised.

mobile.name: dunk
mobile.long_descr: A dunk is here blending into the crowd.
mobile.description: He blends into the crowd as his hand travels into another citizen's pocket.
mobile.offense: backstab disarm dodge dirt_kick trip assist_vnum

mobile.name: tap
mobile.long_descr: A tap is here eyeing your belongings.
mobile.description:
A practitioner in Mega-City One's largest growth industry, mugging, is

                   |looking you over for a possible business transaction.

mobile.name: rookie judge
mobile.long_descr: A Rookie judge is on his first beat here.
mobile.description:
A member of Mega-City One's Justice Department is here considering what

                   |crimes you have committed.  Being a rookie he will probably be easier on

                   |you though.

mobile.name: Wallaby Gleep
mobile.long_descr: Mr. Gleep is here wanting to know what you want.
mobile.description:
Wallaby Gleep is a heavy-set man who gives you the impression that he is

                   |unintelligent and unimaginative, but looks can be deceiving.

mobile.name: Pinkerton Throt
mobile.long_descr: Pinky Throt is here Wringing his hands.
mobile.description:
He is a thin angular crook, pretty close to everyone's idea of Ebeneezer

                   |Scrooge.  Indeed, the only thing guaranteed to bring a spark to his dead

                   |eyes is the mention of money.

mobile.name: Ernie Ramirez
mobile.long_descr: Ernie Ramirez is here collecting for the mob.
mobile.description:
Ramirez is a dour man who knows that he's never going to get a better

                   |deal out of life.  He is content to run the bite fights for Throt and

                   |Gleep.

mobile.name: Judge Eckersely
mobile.long_descr: Judge Eckersely is here shaking down a Perp.
mobile.description:
He is a dedicated, if somewhat pessimistic Judge.  He is the Senior Judge

                   |of the Downtown Quadrant.

mobile.name: Judge Beddows
mobile.long_descr: Judge Beddows is here calling Resyk.
mobile.description:
Beddows is a clone from the same stock as the ex-Chief Judge McGruder.

                   |She is fanatically dedicated to her job and has no ambitions other than

                   |to enforce the LAW.

mobile.name: bite fighter
mobile.long_descr: A bite fighter is here sharpening his teeth.
mobile.description: A bite fighter is here with sharpened teeth and a bad attitude.
